Comment: The ID number of the budget record.
The ID number of the budget this line belongs to (links to CRM_BUDGET_HDR.SEQNO)
The ID number of the period as set up in EXO Business Analytics (links to MANREP_PERIOD.PERIOD_SEQNO).
The ID number of the corresponding period in the current year, as set up in EXO Business Config (links to PERIOD_STATUS.SEQNO).
The ID number of the corresponding period last year, as set up in EXO Business Config (links to PERIOD_STATUS.SEQNO).
The start date of the period.
The end date of the period.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the Account Group level; 0 otherwise.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the Alternate Account Group level; 0 otherwise.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the Debtor account level; 0 otherwise.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the Stock Group level; 0 otherwise.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the Alternate Stock Group level; 0 otherwise.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the Stock item level; 0 otherwise.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the Branch level; 0 otherwise.
This field contains 1 if the budget applies at the staff member level; 0 otherwise.
The date and time when the budget was last calculated.
